sections.heading: Repealed.Section 7-18-2 - Repealed.Section 7-18-3 - Repealed.Section 7-18-4 - Repealed.Section 7-18-5 - Repealed.Section 7-18-6 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1982, ch. 18, § 27, repealed 7-18-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 263, § 1, relating to the short title of the Electrical Energy Tax Act, effective July 1, 1982.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1982, ch. 18, § 27, repealed 7-18-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 263, § 2, relating to definitions, effective July 1, 1982.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1982, ch. 18, § 27, repealed 7-18-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 263, § 3, relating to imposition of tax, rate, denomination as electrical energy tax, effective July 1, 1982.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1982, ch. 18, § 27, repealed 7-18-4 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 263, § 4, relating to measurement and recording of kilowatt hours of electricity, effective July 1, 1982.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1982, ch. 18, § 27, repealed 7-18-5 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 263, § 5, relating to reports and remittances, effective July 1, 1982.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1982, ch. 18, § 27, repealed 7-18-6 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1975, ch. 263, § 6, relating to relief from other taxes, effective July 1, 1982.
